title: Digital loans up 49% in FY24 by value, Rs 1.46 lakh cr disbursed: Industry body
description: The digital lending sector, represented by FACE, saw a significant increase in disbursements and loan numbers in FY23-24, with member entities disbursing Rs 1.46 lakh crore, marking a 49% surge. Over 10 crore loans were issued, up 35% from the previous year. Despite regulatory concerns, the sector emphasizes customer-centricity, compliance, and sustainable practices.
